text: hello and welcome to cupcake addictions
rainbow waffle tutorial where I'm going
to be showing you how to make a
delicious waffle recipe and how to turn
it into these glorious rainbow waffles
the things that you'll need for your
rainbow waffles I've got a set of bowls
just for mixing my different colors some
caster or superfine sugar a little bit
of baking powder 2 eggs a spatula some
melted butter and it's up to you if you
want to use unsalted or salted here
I'm using salted butter if you use
unsalted just add a pinch of salt to
this recipe I've got a whisk 5 Ziploc
bags and a few spoons a little bit of
vanilla essence and my food colors I'm
just using blue green yellow and a bit
of red today some whole milk some plain
flour a little bit of nonstick spray and
of course I've got my waffle maker so
you will need a waffle maker or a waffle
iron for this all of your quantities can
be found on the my cupcake addiction
blog so I will link to that blog post in
the description box below so you can
find all of your quantities and your
conversion rates depending on where
you're watching from so let's get
started now the first thing we want to
do is you want to take that plain flour
and just add in your sugar and also your
baking powder and we're just going to
mix that through to fully combine those
ingredients this is also where you would
add your salt if you're using unsalted
butter beautiful now I want you to add
your eggs to your milk and we're gonna
whisk those together until all of those
eggs are being whisked right through
that milk and we've broken up all the
yolks perfect so when your milks kind of
turned a yellowy color from those eggs
you just want to whisk those into your
main mixture I like to start by actually
combining it with a spatula first and
then we can move on to the whisk if it's
not combined well enough now once your
dry ingredients have been mixed into
your wet we're going to add just a
little bit of vanilla essence and here
you can also add like a little bit of
cinnamon or a little bit of nutmeg if
you like that kind of flavoring we're
going to do about a teaspoon and I'm
gonna do that just by eye and you also
want to add in your melted butter whisk
those ingredients through perfect I love
this batter because it's not too thin
and it's not too runny which I find with
a lot of waffle batters alright so you
wanted to fight your battle evenly into
your 5 different bowls or however many
colors you like - I try to go with too
many colors here because you're going to
have to fit them all into your waffle
maker so it's going to depend on how big
a waffle you think you're going to get
I'd also suggest that you probably need
a little bit more of the colors that are
going to go around the outside so for me
that's going to be red orange and yellow
you'll need a little bit more of those
than you need for the inside colors of
green and blue perfect now you want to
take some of your food coloring here
I've really got four food coloring
summits you're going to mix my red and
my yellow together to make a orangey
color so have a think about whether or
not you need to buy all of those food
colorings or whether or not you can mix
like a yellow and a blue together to
make green or whatever colors you're
looking for and don't be too shy with
your coloring here we really want these
rainbow waffles to pop it's quite a
thick mixture so you don't need to worry
too much about thinning it down you just
want to mix that color through and as
you mix the colors just take one of
these up lock bags for each of those
colors and you can pour that waffle mix
straight in to save you dirtying that
spoon twice so repeat that process
stirring in that color and then spooning
your mixture into the dip lock bag until
you've done all five all right so once
your waffle maker is preheated and I've
got mine on the lightest coloring
setting so a lot of your waffle makers
will have browning settings you want it
on the lightest browning settings so
that you don't have any more color to
these because we really want the bright
colors of that food coloring to show
through take your nonstick spray and
make sure you give you a waffle maker a
really nice coat on both sides and then
you want to take all of your bags we're
gonna snip a generous tip off the end
now before I'm start doing this each one
of these round waffles is actually going
to get cut in half to make two rainbows
so what you're looking for is sort of a
rainbow pattern that comes out like a
big circle snip all of those bags
together because we don't really want
this waffle cooking unevenly we want it
all to cook at the same time all right
starting with blue in the middle I'm
going to come right in the center here
and just come around in a circle that's
going to be the very very center of our
rainbow around goes some green a nice
big circle around the outside then
yellow
then our orange so you can see why you
wanted a bit more of this mix in those
outer ring colors than what you needed
of the inner ring colors so we can use
quite a bit more mixed for the yellow
and the orange and the red then we
bought for the others and lastly you
want the red it already looks amazing
all right close that down and we gonna
let that cook alright so once your
waffle maker has indicated your waffle
is done you want to lift that up have a
look at that that is a textbook perfect
rainbow waffle so now you just want to
remove your waffle from your pan pop it
onto your plate and to serve that one
you want to cut it in half because
you're going to get two rainbows out of
each of these waffles so you can cut it
into four pieces if you like there
you've got your gorgeous rainbow waffles
these are absolutely gorgeous they're
really really simple to make I recommend
serving them with a couple of big scoops
of either plain vanilla ice cream or of
whipped cream because they're both nice
and white and they'll look like clouds
and then a little pot of maple syrup
gold somewhere down the end of the
rainbow these rainbow waffles are
actually part of a collaboration with a
bunch of other great channels for
international waffle day which is coming
up so if you want to see a whole lot of
great waffle ideas I will leave a link
to an entire waffle playlist below make
sure you check it out if you're a little
bit waffle mad I hope you guys have
loved this rainbow waffle idea I hope
you'll enjoy making these for your
friends and family and as always thanks
very much for tuning in to my cryptic
